name: Advanced Academic Rheumatology Review Course (AdARRC) 2024
content: Established in 2011, AdARRC has earned a distinguished reputation as a premier platform for clinicians seeking comprehensive updated on RMDs. Over the past 10 years, AdARRC has been dedicated to providing fundamental education on RMDs, focusing on disease knowledge, management, and treatment. During this period many milestones were achieved. Current decade is committed to unveiling significant advancements in fundamental research, addressing critical needs in rheumatic health, and introducing novel disease management strategies, innovative treatments approaches, new drugs, therapies, and medical devices. AdARRC serves as the convergence point for innovation, research, and development, aiming to solve healthcare system sustainability challenges and meet patientsâ€™ real needs.
